snippet.title: Luck be a Landlord - Steam Early Access Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to Steam Early Access on January 8th, 2021!
Play the free Luck be a Landlord Demo now and Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1404850/Luck_be_a_Landlord/

Luck be a Landlord is a roguelike deckbuilder about using a slot machine to earn rent money and defeat capitalism. This game does not contain any real-world currency gambling or microtransactions.

Official Website: http://LuckBeALandlord.com/
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TrampolineTales
Join the Discord: https://TrampolineTales.com/discord
Music from ZapSplat: https://www.ZapSplat.com/
